description: This Data set provides a cumulative measure of the human modification of terrestrial lands across the globe at a 1-km resolution.
title: Global Human Modification of Terrestrial Systems, v1 (2016)
citation:
Kennedy, C. M., J. R. Oakleaf, D. M. Theobald, S. Baruch-Mordo, and
J. Kiesecker. 2020. Global Human Modification of Terrestrial Systems. Palisades, NY:
NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC)
